name: BrownNoises
skdetail:

Invocation Name: brown noises
Developer Terms of Use
des:
• BROWN NOISES •
Brown Noises is an Alexa skill designed to help you unwind and de-stress whenever you need it. With a wide range of calming sounds, including nature sounds, white noise, and ambient music, you can find the perfect soundscape to suit your mood. Whether you're trying to meditate, focus, or simply escape from the distractions of daily life.

• FUNCTIONALITIES •
Brown Noises reproduces relaxing audio tracks that will help you sleep better. 

• SLEEP BETTER BOOK •
You can now buy our latest sleep book "Sleep Better"! Open the skill to know more!

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.

• ALEXA ROUTINES •
To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:
- Enable this Alexa skill.
- On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
- Click + to add a new routine.
- Click + for "When
priv:
